dict.string: House, home and accommodation
Describe your favourite room in the place you are living now
What it looks like?&What you usually use it for?&Why you like it?&And how it compares to other rooms you have been in or know about?
House, home and accommodation
Describe a quiet place
Where it is?&What you can do there?&Who you would like to go with?&and explain how you feel about this place
House, home and accommodation
Describe a time you moved to a new home or school
When did you move?&Where did you move to?&Why did you move?&And explain how did you feel about that?
House, home and accommodation
Talk about the place where one of your friends or relations lives.
Where it is?&What it is like?&What the local area is like?&And say if you would like to live in that place or not, and why?
House, home and accommodation
Describe a house or flat that you know well but have never lived in.
Whose home it is or was?&What it looks like?&What the local area is like?&And say if you would like to live in that place or not, and why?
House, home and accommodation
Describe the first place you remember living
How old you were when you first started living there?&What you remember best about the place?&If you moved away or not, and why?&And say if you remember that place well or not, and why?
House, home and accommodation
Describe your dream home
What it would look like outside?&What it would look like inside?&What kind of area it would be in?&And say if you think you will really live in a house like that or not, and why?
House, home and accommodation
Describe your neighbourhood
What kind of shops there are?&What green spaces and natural features there are?&What things there are to do?&And say what kind of person you think would like living in that kind of area, and why?
House, home and accommodation
Describe a place you have lived in or are living now
Where it is?&What are the good things about it?&What are the bad things about it?&And say where you would like to live if you didn’t live there?
House, home and accommodation
Describe your favourite room in the place you are living now
What it looks like?&What you usually use it for?&Why you like it?&And how it compares to other rooms you have been in or know about?
What the change was?&When and where this change happened?&What caused this change?&And explain how you benefited from this change.
Describe a recent change of you
Work and Studies
What it is?&How you knew about it?&What this company does?&How you feel about it?
Describe a big company or organization you know.
Work and Studies
Who the person is?&What kind of person?&How this person help you?&Why do you think this person is helpful
Describe a person who is helpful in your study or work.
Work and Studies
what the change was?&when it happened?&where it happened?&and explain how you have benefited from this change?
Describe a positive change that you have made to your life.
Work and Studies
where you would like to go?&what kind of work you would like to have?&when you would like to go?&and explain why you want to work in that place.
Describe a foreign country that you want to work in.
Work and Studies
What the invention was?&What it can do?&How popular it is?&Why it is an important invention?
Describe an invention that changed the world.
Work and Studies
Where you usually meet or met?&When you first met?&What things you talk or talked about?&And say whether you would say this person is a close friend or not, and why?
Describe a classmate or colleague you often meet or met.
Work and Studies
What it would look like?&What facilities it would have?&Where it would be?&And say if you think you will ever work in a place like that or not, and why?
Describe your dream workplace.
Work and Studies

Why you want to study that subject?&What things about that subject you find particularly interesting?&Where it is possible to study that subject?&And say if you think you will start studying it soon or not, and why?
Talk about a subject you would like to study in the future
Work and Studies

How and when you first became interested in that job?&What people in that job have to do everyday?&What qualifications and experience you need in order to get that job?&And say if you think you will be able to get that job or not, and why?
Describe a job you would like to do in the future.
Work and Studies

What kind of things you would do in that job?&What the working conditions would be like?&What kind of workplace you would work in?&And say if you think you will be able to get a job like that or not, and why?
Describe your dream job
Work and Studies
What the reason for doing that project was?&How successful the project was?&How long it took you?&And say if you enjoyed working on that project or not, and why?
Describe a project you had to do on your own or with others as part of your studies or job
Work and Studies
What the building looks like?&What is inside the building?&What things there are to do in the local area?&And say if you think it is a good place to work or not, and why?
Describe a workplace you have worked in or know about
Work and Studies
What the name of the subject was?&What topics you studied as part of that subject?&Why you liked it?&And say why you think some people didn’t like that subject as much as you did.
Talk about a school subject you liked when you were younger
Work and Studies
Why you need to do it?&How often you do it?&If it is a difficult thing to do?&And say if you would like to do that thing more often or not, and why?
Describe one thing that you have to do as part of your work or studies.
Work and Studies
What it looks like from the outside?&What it looks like inside?&What facilities there are?&And say if you think it is a good school building or not, and why?
Describe a school that you are studying in or studied in
Work and Studies
How long they have been doing that job?&What the good things about that job are?&What the difficulties of doing that job are?&And say if you think that person enjoys their job or not, and why?
Talk about a job someone in your family does
Work and Studies
Work and Studies
Talk about a job you have done or know about
What people do in that job?&What kind of place they work in?&What clothes and equipment they need?&And say if you think it is a satisfying job to do or not, and why.
Work and Studies
Describe a classroom that you study or have studied in.
What part of the school or college it is in?&What it looks like?&What things are in it?&And say if you think the people who study there like it or not, and why.
Work and Studies
Talk about something you use to help you in your work or studies.
What it looks like?&What it does?&How often you use this thing?&And say what you would do if you could not use this object.
Sports, hobbies and free time
Describe an interesting advertisement that you have seen.
where you saw it?&what it was about?&why you think it was an interesting advertisement.
Sports, hobbies and free time
Describe a time you need to arrive early
When it was?&What time you arrived?&Why you need to arrive early?&And explain how you felt.
Sports, hobbies and free time
Describe a popular place where people like to go swimming
Where is this place?&When did you first visit this place?&How often do you go to this place?&And explain why it is so popular.
Sports, hobbies and free time
Describe a piece of clothing you like wearing
what the item of clothing is?&where and when you bought it?&when you wear it?&and explain why you like wearing it.
Sports, hobbies and free time
Describe a painting or work of art that you remember deeply.
when you saw this work of art?&where you saw it?&what it looked like?&and explain your impression of it.
Sports, hobbies and free time
Describe your favourite song or piece of music.
What kind of music it is?&Where you usually listen to it?&Why you like it?&and say what kind of mood this music puts you in.
Sports, hobbies and free time
Describe a TV series or drama you enjoy watching
What it is?&What it’s about?&When did you first watched it?&And explain why you like watching it?
Sports, hobbies and free time
Describe a favorite sport which you watched
What it is?&When you watch it?&Who you watch it with?&And explain why you like watching it?
Sports, hobbies and free time
Describe a place crowded with people
Where it was?&When you went there?&What you did there?&And explain how you felt about the crowded place.
Sports, hobbies and free time
Describe a café that you have been to.
where it is?&why you went there?&what you ate or drank?&and explain why you liked or disliked the café.
Sports, hobbies and free time
Describe a website you like to visit.
How you know it?&What it is about?&How often you use it?&and explain why you like to visit it?
Sports, hobbies and free time
Talk about a musical instrument you would like to be able to play but have never tried.
What the instrument looks like?&What it sounds like?&What kinds of people it is popular with?&And say if you think you will ever try to play that instrument or not, and why?
Sports, hobbies and free time
Talk about a book you have never read but would like to read.
How well known it is?&Why you would like to read it?&Why you have never read it before?&And say how you think it will compare to other books you have read?
Sports, hobbies and free time
Give a short presentation about a movie that you have never seen but would like to see.
What kind of movie it is?&How famous it is?&Why you want to see it?&And say if you think you will see that movie in the near future or not, and why?
Sports, hobbies and free time
Talk about a sport that interests you but you have never tried.
Where it is usually played?&What kinds of people usually play it?&Why it interests you?&And say if you think you will ever do this sport or not, and why?
Sports, hobbies and free time
Talk about a new sport or hobby you would like to take up
Why you are interested in that thing?&If it is an easy or hard thing to start?&What the best way to start doing it is?&And say if you think you will start doing it soon or not, and why?
Sports, hobbies and free time
Talk about a hobby you had when you were a child

How you first became interested in it?&How long you did it or have been doing it for?&Why you enjoyed doing it?&And say if you have become more or less interested in that hobby since you were a child, and why?
Sports, hobbies and free time
Describe a TV programme that you often watch.

What kind of programme it is?&Why you watch it?&When and why you first started watching it?&And say if you think that programme is better than other TV programmes that are on at the same time or not, and why?
Sports, hobbies and free time
Describe a place where you often go on your days off.
Where it is?&Who you go with?&Why you go there?&And say how it compares to other places where you could spend your free time?
Sports, hobbies and free time
Describe a film you have seen which you remember well.
What sort of film it is?&When and where you saw it?&What your favourite part of the film was?&And explain why you remember it well?
Sports, hobbies and free time
Describe a TV programme that you watch or know about
When it is on and which channel it is on?&What kind of programme it is?&What kind of people watch it?&And say if you think that programme is or could be popular in other countries or not, and why?
Sports, hobbies and free time
Describe a typical day when you are not working or studying
Where you go?&What you do?&Who you spend your time with?&And say how those days vary?
Sports, hobbies and free time
Talk about a book you are reading now or have read recently
How and why you got it?&How long you it took you to read it or how long you have been reading it?&What kind of book it is?&And say if you would like to read something else similar or not, and why.
Sports, hobbies and free time
Talk about a sport you like doing or watching
How you first became interested in it?&Why you are interested in it?&What equipment and skills are needed?&And say if you think it is an easy sport to do or not, and why.
Family, friends and pets
Describe a time you spent with a child.
who the child is?&how you know him/her?&why you spent time with him/her?&and explain what you did when you were together
Family, friends and pets
Describe a time when you receive something for free
What it was?&When and where you got it?&Why you got it?&And explain how you felt about it.
Family, friends and pets
Describe a family member that made you proud.
Who the person is ?&Are you close ?&What he/she did made you proud ?&and explain why.
Family, friends and pets
Describe a polite person you know
Who the person is?&How you know the person?&What the person looks like?&And explain why you think the person is polite.
Family, friends and pets
Describe a person who gave a clever solution to a problem.
Who the person is?&When and where it happened?&What the problem was?&And explain why it was a clever solution?
Family, friends and pets
An occasion a person or something that made you laugh
what this news was?&when and where you heard it?&how you heard it?&and explain why you think it was good news?
Family, friends and pets
Describe a happy childhood memory
when and where the incident you remember happened?&who you were with?&what happened exactly?&and explain why it is a happy memory.
Family, friends and pets
Describe an interesting neighbour.
Who this person is?&How you know this person?&What this person likes to do?&And explain why you think this neighbor is interesting?
Family, friends and pets
Describe a couple you know who have a happy marriage.
Who they are?&How you knew them?&How long they have been married?&And explain why you think they have a happy marriage.
Family, friends and pets
Talk about the home of one of your friends or relatives.
How long they have been living there?&What it is like outside?&What it is like inside?&And say if you think that home reflects the personality of your friend or relative or not, and why?
Family, friends and pets
Describe a relative you haven’t met for a long time.
Why you haven’t met that person?&Where and when you last met them?&What you think that person has been doing since that time?&And say whether you think you will meet them again soon or not, and why?
Family, friends and pets
Describe a friend that you haven’t seen for a long time.

Why you haven’t met that person?&Where and when you last met him or her?&What you think that person has been doing since that time?&And say whether you think you will meet him or her again soon or not, and why?
Family, friends and pets
Talk about the last time your whole family got together.
Where you met?&What you did together?&How long you spent together?&And say if you would like to do the same thing again soon or not, and why?
Family, friends and pets
Talk about a hobby of one of your family members or friends.
How often they do it?&Where they usually do it?&Who they usually do it with?&And say if you think that is a good hobby to have or not, and why?
Family, friends and pets
Describe a family member that you get on well with.
What their personality is like?&What things they like doing?&If they have any strong dislikes?&And say why you think you have a good relationship?
Family, friends and pets
Describe a friend you had in primary school.
What that person was like?&How long you were friends for?&What things you did together?&And say whether you are still in contact with that person or not, and why?
Family, friends and pets
Describe a classmate, colleague or acquaintance

How well you know them?&When and how you first met them?&How long you have been working or studying together?&And say whether you think you will get to know that person better in the future or not, and why?
Family, friends and pets
Describe a friend you have had or had for a long time
How you met?&What things you do or did together?&What things you have or had in common?&And say why you think your friendship lasted a long time?
Family, friends and pets
Describe a friend who has played an important part in your life.
How you met this person?&How long you have known them?&The kind of thing you do or did with them?&And explain why they have been important in your life?
Family, friends and pets
Talk about a job someone in your family does
How long they have had that job?&What they do in their job?&When and where they work?&And say if you think that is the best kind of job for that person or not, and why?
Family, friends and pets
Talk about a pet you have or have had. You should mention
Its appearance.&Its personality.&Its habits.&And say if you would like to have a similar pet again or not, and why?
Family, friends and pets
Describe a friend that you often spend time with
How often you see this friend?&Where you usually go together?&What things you do together?&And say why you like spending time with this person.
Family, friends and pets
Describe one of your relatives
What that person looks like?&What that person’s character is like?&What they are doing at the moment?&And say which other relative of yours they are most similar to?
